title: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit Announce 2025 North American Tour
description: Kicking off in April and stretching through July with stops throughout the US and Canada. Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit Announce 2025 North American Tour Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit will be hitting the road together for a 2025 North American tour following Isbell's solo outing at the top of the year.
text: Following his previously announced solo tour, Jason Isbell is set to return to the road with his trusty band, The 400 Unit, for another lengthy 2025 tour. The new dates kick off with a three-night stay in Austin in April and stretch through late July. During the last month of the tour, they’ll make a quick detour for the inaugural Zootown Festival in Missoula, Montana. In addition to stops in US cities like Detroit, Birmingham, Baltimore, and Savannah, Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit will swing into Canada in May to hit Saskatoon, Edmonton, Kelowna, and Vancouver. See the full list of dates below. Get Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit Tickets Here Those interested in participating in the artist pre-sale on Wednesday, December 11th at 10:00 a.m. local time can sign up for the mailing list here. Top Spotify listeners can expect a code for a separate pre-sale taking place via Ticketmaster on Thursday, December 12th at 10:00 a.m. local time, after which tickets will go on sale to the general public on Friday, December 13th at 10:00 a.m. local time. A number of special guests are set to join Isbell and the band; Molly Tuttle and Golden Highway, Band of Horses, singer-songwriter Garrison Starr, and instrumental prodigy Grace Bowers are set to make appearances throughout. Revisit our 2023 cover story with Jason Isbell now. html:
Following his previously announced solo tour, Jason Isbell is set to return to the road with his trusty band, The 400 Unit, for another lengthy 2025 tour. The new dates kick off with a three-night stay in Austin in April and stretch through late July. During the last month of the tour, they’ll make a quick detour for the inaugural Zootown Festival in Missoula, Montana.

In addition to stops in US cities like Detroit, Birmingham, Baltimore, and Savannah, Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit will swing into Canada in May to hit Saskatoon, Edmonton, Kelowna, and Vancouver. See the full list of dates below.

Get Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit Tickets Here

Those interested in participating in the artist pre-sale on Wednesday, December 11th at 10:00 a.m. local time can sign up for the mailing list here. Top Spotify listeners can expect a code for a separate pre-sale taking place via Ticketmaster on Thursday, December 12th at 10:00 a.m. local time, after which tickets will go on sale to the general public on Friday, December 13th at 10:00 a.m. local time.

A number of special guests are set to join Isbell and the band; Molly Tuttle and Golden Highway, Band of Horses, singer-songwriter Garrison Starr, and instrumental prodigy Grace Bowers are set to make appearances throughout.

Revisit our 2023 cover story with Jason Isbell now.
